P02B60_2E.txt  1/4/5
2 phase device.
For iXon 60BI (10/5/3/1 MHz with Datel 1410).
IMO clocking during readout (should be OK for newer chips).
Important for horz clks to have 90% overlap, if not done in pattern then in verniers.
PDT is used to generate delay for better hole transport in BIs.

SIIBSSSS 	SSI-ISR- 	--H-A-D- 	HC-RR--M 	--F----F 	SSR-C-P-
441 PPPP     	123 23S  	  V M M  	VG 31  U 	  I    R 	CC2 G X
    3210     	      T  	  F P P  	R3     X 	  R    A 	23  2 L
<VS-st>
11100000	10101110	00000000	00001001	00000000	00101000
11100000	10101110	00000000	00001001	00000000	00101000
11100000	01101110	00000000	00001001	00000000	00101000
11110000	01101110	00000000	00001001	00000000	00101000
<\VS-st>					
					
<VS-all>				
11100000	10100110	00000000	00001001	00000000	00101000
11100000	10100110	00100000	00001001	00000000	00101000
11000000	01101110	00000000	10001001	00000000	00101000
11010000	01101110	00000000	00001001	00000000	00101000
<\VS-all>				

<PDT>
11101001	10100100	00000000	00001001	00000000	00101000
11100000	10100100	00000000	00001001	00000000	00101000
11100000	10100100	00000000	00001001	00000000	00101000
11010000	10100100	00000000	00001001	00000000	00101000
<\PDT>

<HV>
11100000	11101100	00000000	00001001	00000000	00101000
11100000	11101100	00000000	00001001	00000000	00101000
11100000	11101100	00000000	00001001	00000000	00101000
11110000	11101100	00000000	00001001	00000000	00101000
<\HV>

<VH>					
11100000	11101100	00000000	00001001	00000000	00101000
11100000	11101100	00000000	00001001	00000000	00101000
11100000	11101100	00000000	00001001	00000000	00101000
11110000	11101100	00000000	00001001	00000000	00101000
<\VH>

****************************************************************************************
CCD60 has no conventional amplifier.
****************************************************************************************
